bill_title: authorize certain grants to local industrial development corporations from the REDI fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize certain grants to local industrial development corporations from the REDI fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-16G be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The board may make grants from the revolving economic development and initiative fund to local industrial development corporations. The local industrial development corporation shall use any such grant to match federal funds made available to the corporation to promote economic development. To implement this section, the board may promulgate pursuant to chapter 1-26 rules to do the following: (1) Establish application procedures for applying for the grants authorized by this section; (2) Establish criteria to determine which applicants will receive a grant; (3) Establish criteria for the terms and conditions upon which a grant shall be made; and (4) Govern the use of the proceeds of a grant. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
